name: Homemade Mexican Crema
description: This is an easy way to make a homemade batch of delicious, tangy Mexican Crema.

recipeInstructions.text: Slightly warm 1 cup heavy cream to room temperature in a saucepan
recipeInstructions.name: Slightly warm 1 cup heavy cream to room temperature in a saucepan

recipeInstructions.text: Add 1 Tablespoon buttermilk to the pan and mix well
recipeInstructions.name: Add 1 Tablespoon buttermilk to the pan and mix well

recipeInstructions.text: Add mixture to a jar and lightly cover
recipeInstructions.name: Add mixture to a jar and lightly cover

recipeInstructions.text: Keep jar on counter (or in warm place) for the next 12-24 hours.
recipeInstructions.name: Keep jar on counter (or in warm place) for the next 12-24 hours.

recipeInstructions.text: In a few hours it will thicken even more
recipeInstructions.name: In a few hours it will thicken even more

recipeInstructions.text: Add the juice of 1/2 lime and a generous pinch of salt to the jar and mix well
recipeInstructions.name: Add the juice of 1/2 lime and a generous pinch of salt to the jar and mix well

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately or store in the fridge
